text: I ordered 2 items online on Sunday night - got a call Wednesday to say 1 item out of stock and no replacement available- just an apology nothing else and money was debited immediately on Sunday â‚¬99.95 but have to wait a week to refund. Put me off buying from this siteðŸ˜©ðŸ˜¡
